prevc-architect-specialist.description: Designs overall system architecture and patterns

prevc-refactoring-specialist.description: Identifies code smells and improves code structure

prevc-bug-fixer.description: Analyzes bug reports and implements targeted fixes

prevc-test-writer.description: Writes comprehensive tests and maintains test coverage

prevc-feature-developer.description: Implements new features according to specifications

prevc-code-reviewer.description: Reviews code changes for quality, style, and best practices

prevc-security-auditor.description: Identifies security vulnerabilities and implements best practices
